item.title: Close please
item.dc:creator: @Lordabyssal Lordabyssal
item.description:
@Lordabyssal wrote:

Alright solved it. Player must disconnect to update inventory after resetting id 3214. All though I have run into another problem after my itemdefs have been changed and I teleport (Thinking something to do with region) it set the itemdefs back to default.

Read full topic

item.title: Close please
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Server sided:
https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Interface_item

And then there’s packet 53, which doesn’t seem to be on the wiki. I’ve seen it used in basically every PI ever.
it’s found in the ItemAssisstant.java file, a method called resetItems(int WriteFrame)
You’d use that method with the id of the inventory, and it’d “refresh” like you want.

Yes, this can be achieved client sided. I just don’t know how without looking further.

Read full topic
